apn.description: Authentication provider's name issuing the auth code

cis.description: Indicates URL for CoAP native cloud interface server to be registered

at.description: Indicates access token which is given in return of auth code issued by an appropriate account server

sid.description: The Server identity of the OCF Cloud used for verifying the OCF Cloud certificate.

allOf.description: Trusted Certificate of the OCF cloud to be connected.

cps.description: Indicates the cloud registration status of the device. (0: Need to Configure, 1: Registering to CoAP Native Cloud, 2: Registered to CoAP Native Cloud, 3: Failed to Register to CoAP Native Cloud, 4: Publishing resources to CoAP Native Cloud, 5: Published resources to CoAP Native Cloud, 6: Failed to publish resources to CoAP Native Cloud, 7~254: Reserved, 255: EOF)

clec.description: Indicates a failure reason (0: No Error. 1: Failed to access CoAP Cloud server,  2: No response from CoAP Cloud server,  3: Invalid Access Token, 4: Failed to refresh Access Token, 5: Failed to find a registered device in CoAP Cloud, 6: Failed to find a registered user in CoAP Cloud, 7~254: Reserved, 255: Unknown error)
